definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: ransom (NH in deriv.; Ph. in n.pr.; As. padû, id., Ar. faday; Eth. fadaya:; Min. [[פדית]] redeemed or purchased land Mordt:Beitr. 23);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[פָּדָה]] Le 27:27 +; sf. [[פָּֽדְְ]] Job 5:20; 2 ms. [[פָּדִיתָ]] De 9:26 +, etc.; Impf. [[יִפְדֶּה]] Ps 49:8 +, etc.; Imv. [[פְּדֵה]] Ps 25:22; sf. [[פְּדֵנִי]] Ps 26:11 + 3 t.; Inf. abs. [[פָּדׂה]] Nu 18:15, Ps 49:8; cstr. [[לִפְדּוֹת]] 2Sa 7:23 = 1Ch 17:2; Pt. act. [[פּוֹדֶה]] Ps 34:23; sf. [[פּׂדְְ]] De 13:6; pass. pl. cstr. [[פְּדוּיֵּי]] Is 35:10, Is 51:11, Nu 3:49; also abs. [[פְּדוּיִם]] Nu 3:51 (Qr; Kt [[פדים]]), cstr. [[פְּדוּיֵי]] v:Nu 3:46; sf. [[פְּדוּיׇו]] Nu 18:16 (all n. abstr. acc. to Di Kö:ii. 1, 138, v. [[פְּדוּיִם]], [[פִּדְיׁם]] infr.);—ransom:
fr. violence and death 1Sa 14:45, Job 6:23, Ps 49:8.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: fr. Egypt, c. [[מִן]], [[מִבֵּית עֲבָדִים]] De 7:8, De 13:6, Mic 6:4; [[מִנִּי־חָר]] Ps 78:42; [[ממחרים]] 2Sa 7:23 (but del. [[פָּדִיתָ]] Gei:Urschr. 288 We Dr al.) = 1Ch 17:21; [[מִשָּׁם]] De 24:18; abs. De 9:26, De 15:15, De 21:8, Ne 1:10.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: in gen. Ho 7:13; [[מִכּׂל חָרוֹתָיו]] Ps 25:22; [[מִכּׂל עֲוֹנוֹתָיו]] Ps 130:8.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Inf. abs.) [[הָפְדֵּה לאׁ נִפְדָָּתָה]] Le 19:20 she hath not been at all ransomed (from bondage); Impf. [[יִפָּדֶה]] Le 27:29 (from ban); 3 fs. [[חִיּוֹן בְּמִשְׁפָּט תִּפָּדֶָה]] Is 1:27.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. sf. [[וְהֶפְדָּהּ]] Ex 21:8 he shall let her be ransomed.
